name: GRIMLORE - Trickery or Treat
description:
Figure out who is worthy for a sacrifice during your tricks and treats!

The game randomly generates who is the criminal om every replay.  (new game)

This game was made in only 2 days for Gameboy and Gameboy Color!

  • WASD/arrow keys - move, enter door, climb
  • K/Z - interact, confirm  (A)
  • J/X - cancel (B)
  • Enter  - start, pause
  • Shift - select
